sources.title: Dora's Dunking Doughnuts
sources.description: Title: Dora's Dunking Doughnuts Summary: A schoolteacher helps his friend Dora by getting his students to help him to make a radio commercial. Directed by: Harry Edwards Actors: Andy Clyde, Ethel Sykes, Bud Jamison Production Company: Educational Films Corporation of America Release Date: 1 September 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Schoolteacher Andy Wilson makes his usual morning stop for coffee and donuts at Dora's Home Bakery. Today he enjoys talking to Dora so much that he is late to school for the first time. Later that day, Dora tells him about some wonderful new donuts that she has made. Andy is so impressed with them that he decides to have his students help him make a radio commercial, in order to help Dora sell her new product.
